subject: Athletics and Sports
Memorabilia and Souvenirs
Golf
Tennis
lead_paragraph: When a fan grabbed a potentially valuable ball that Louis Oosthuizen tossed into the Master crowd, it was a refreshing reminder that some don't care about making money off memorabilia.
snippet: When a fan grabbed a potentially valuable ball that Louis Oosthuizen tossed into the Master crowd, it was a refreshing reminder that some don't care about making money off memorabilia.
